column2: an A.M. Eatery////I have never been a huge breakfast food/ brunch person
column3: but I love Snooze! It's my favorite brunch place ever!! The food is consistently amazing every time I go. However
column4: whether I go on a weekday or at an early time on a weekend
column5: there will always be a wait here. I think my shortest wait time was 25 minutes at noon on a Thursday
column6: which is great for Snooze. It's usually 2 hours during peak times (noon/1pm) on Saturdays and Sundays.
